sources.title: Band of the Hand (1986) Survival training to street action: the vigilante upgrade
sources.description:
When ex-gang leader Ruben Pacheco and his crew—James, Carlos, and Moss—team up under the tough guidance of Joe Tegra, they trade street rivalries for a high-stakes mission against Miami’s criminal underworld. With Nikki’s sharp instincts and Cream’s schemes in their sights, this squad proves that sometimes, the best defense is a little offense.

Original title: Band of the Hand
Alternative title: I 5 della squadra d'assalto
Director: Paul Michael Glaser
Writers: Leo Garen, Jack Baran

Main cast:
Stephen Lang - Joe Tegra
Michael Carmine - Ruben Pacheco
Lauren Holly - Nikki
John Cameron Mitchell - James Lee
Danny Quinn - Carlos Aragon
Leon Robinson - Moss Roosevelt
James Remar - Cream
Paul Calderon - Tito

Genres: Action, Crime, Drama, Thriller
Release date: April 11, 1986 (USA)
Filming location: Miami, Florida, USA

metadata.Plot: In an attempt of resocialisation, five hopeless juvenile criminals, J.L., a silent boy with 80s fashion sense who murdered his abusive father, Ruben, a Latino gangbanger, Moss, a African American gangbanger and Ruben's mortal enemy, Dorcey, an illiterate runaway car thief, and Carlos, a Cuban refugee turned slick yuppie drug dealer, are sent away from prison into the Everglades for a survival training under Vietnam war veteran, "Indian Joe" Tegra. When this is successful, they move back to Miami slums. However this offends the former illegal inhabitants of the rundown two story house they settle in, all loyal customers of drug baron Cream. The conflict escalates into a bloody gunfight, but what the boys don't know is that Cream is just a henchman for the merciless Miami drug lord Nestor, who also has Carlos' girl Nikki with him.
metadata.Actors: Stephen Lang, Michael Carmine, Lauren Holly
